Room.Name: A downward spiral
Room.Description: You are standing on a small spiral staircase leading down into the blackness. The edges of the pit are jagged and charred by some sort of intense fire. Looking around you can see that some small bits of fire allow a little illumination as the stairs go deeper into the ground.

Room.Name: A downward spiral
Room.Description: You are standing on a small spiral staircase leading down into the blackness. The edges of the pit are jagged and charred by some sort of intense fire. Looking around you can see that some small bits of fire allow a little illumination as the stairs go deeper into the ground.

Room.Name: A downward spiral
Room.Description: You are standing on a small spiral staircase leading down into the blackness. The edges of the pit are jagged and charred by some sort of intense fire. Looking around you can see that some small bits of fire allow a little illumination as the stairs go deeper into the ground.

Room.Name: A dimly lit corridor
Room.Description: On the first level of this pit, you can see that many people have used this place before, but no one can be seen around in the hallways. In the distance you can hear the sounds of clanking metal, whips, and muffled screams. On the floor you can see where people have scuffed away the once smooth stone walkways leaving only a mixture of dirt and crushed rock. The walls on both sides show a series of iron rings caked in dried blood.

The walls on both sides show a series of iron rings caked in dried blood. You notice to the north of this room that there is a wooden door with iron bars.

ExtraDescription.Description: Looking this door, you notice that the bars have claw and scratch marks all through them. Someone evidentally enjoy their visit here and tried to escape.

The walls on both sides show a series of iron rings caked in dried blood.

Room.Name: A small room
Room.Description: You are standing inside a small room before the entrance to the second level of this prison. The muffled screams now sound as if they are pain induced. One set of laughter can be heard clearly over the chorus of painful screams.

Room.Name: A small staircase
Room.Description: Walking into this room you see a set of stairs going deeper into the pit. The darkness has gotten more intense and the air has become foul with the smell of decaying flesh. You can hear people begging for them to be put out of their misery.

Room.Name: Entering the lower levels
Room.Description: At this point of the dungeon, the air is almost too foul for you too breathe in. Unlike the level above, this place looks like a slaughter house. Remains of unfortunate prisoners line the walls and floors like a gruesome type of decoration. The screams are clear now and coming from all directions. Men, women, and children are yelling out pleads for mercy yet they are answered only with more pain. Perhaps you should investigate further into the area to see what lies behind this all.

Room.Name: The realm of the sadist
Room.Description: The air here is almost too foul for you too breathe in without vomiting. Unlike the level above, this place looks like a slaughter house. Remains of unfortunate prisoners line the walls and floors like a gruesome type of decoration. The screams are clear now and coming from all directions. Men, women, and children are yelling out pleads for mercy yet they are answered only with more pain.

Room.Name: The realm of the sadist
Room.Description: The air here is almost too foul for you too breathe in without vomiting. Unlike the level above, this place looks like a slaughter house. Men, women, and children are yelling out pleads for mercy yet they are answered only with more pain.

Room.Description: The air here is almost too foul for you too breathe in without vomiting. Unlike the level above, this place looks like a slaughter house. Remains of unfortunate prisoners line the walls and floors like a gruesome type of decoration. The screams are clear now and coming from all directions. Men, women, and children are yelling out pleads for mercy yet they are answered only with more pain. To the east you see a door covered in bars and magical runes.

Room.Name: The realm of the sadist
Room.Description: The air here is almost too foul for you too breathe in without vomiting. Unlike the level above, this place looks like a slaughter house. Remains of unfortunate prisoners line the walls and floors like a gruesome type of decoration. The screams are clear now and coming from all directions. Men, women, and children are yelling out pleads for mercy yet they are answered only with more pain. To north you see a large iron door with a name engraved on it. To the south you see a large wooden door with a barred window.

ExtraDescription.Description: You see a name carved into the top of the door reading...."Room of the Madhatter".

Room.Name: The realm of the sadist
Room.Description: The air here is almost too foul for you too breathe in without vomiting. Unlike the level above, this place looks like a slaughter house. Room.Name: The realm of the sadist
Room.Description: The air here is almost too foul for you too breathe in without vomiting. Unlike the level above, this place looks like a slaughter house. Remains of unfortunate prisoners line the walls and floors like a gruesome type of decoration. The screams are clear now and coming from all directions. Men, women, and children are yelling out pleads for mercy yet they are answered only with more pain.

Room.Name: A prison room
Room.Description: You are standing inside an average size room adorned with a long wooden bed, and a table covered in a series of devices made strictly for prolonged torture. Along the walls of this room are old and tattered ropes used to hold victims who were lucky enough to be next after the person on the table was done being toyed with.

Room.Name: A prison room
Room.Description: You are standing inside an average size room adorned with a long wooden bed, and a table covered in a series of devices made strictly for prolonged torture. Along the walls of this room are old and tattered ropes used to hold victims who were lucky enough to be next after the person on the table was done being toyed with.

Room.Description: You are standing inside an average size room adorned with a long wooden bed, and a table covered in a series of devices made strictly for prolonged torture. Along the walls of this room are old and tattered ropes used to hold victims who were lucky enough to be next after the person on the table was done being toyed with.

Room.Name: A prison room
Room.Description: You are standing inside an average size room adorned with a long wooden bed, and a table covered in a series of devices made strictly for prolonged torture. Along the walls of this room are old and tattered ropes used to hold victims who were lucky enough to be next after the person on the table was done being toyed with.

Room.Name: Madhatter's private room
Room.Description: This room is much larger than the other prison rooms you have seen around this place. Also, this room is covered in psychadelic hues of red and orange with exotic flowers all around. A special rack lies in the center of the room with a series of wenches and pulleys connected by razor edged wire. Small embers of fire can be seen underneath the table itself giving the person participating on the table a warm and cozy feeling. Weapons of all types line the walls all showing years and years of use. On one side the room is a series of hooks in the wall used for hanging up whatever the Madhatter desires. Currently the majority of them are holding hats as well as heads.

Room.Name: A prison room
Room.Description: You are standing inside an average size room adorned with a long wooden bed, and a table covered in a series of devices made strictly for prolonged torture. Along the walls of this room are old and tattered ropes used to hold victims who were lucky enough to be next after the person on the table was done being toyed with.

Along the walls of this room are old and tattered ropes used to hold victims who were lucky enough to be next after the person on the table was done being toyed with.

Along the walls of this room are old and tattered ropes used to hold victims who were lucky enough to be next after the person on the table was done being toyed with.

Along the walls of this room are old and tattered ropes used to hold victims who were lucky enough to be next after the person on the table was done being toyed with.

Room.Name: The sanctuary
Room.Description: In the midst of this pit a place of peace and security magically appeared. Inside this room, an overwhelming comfort allows you to relax with little to no worries.

Room.Name: The sanctuary
Room.Description: In the midst of this pit a place of peace and security magically appeared. Inside this room, an overwhelming comfort allows you to relax with little to no worries.

Room.Name: The sanctuary
Room.Description: In the midst of this pit a place of peace and security magically appeared. Inside this room, an overwhelming comfort allows you to relax with little to no worries.

NPC.name: demon creature pit
NPC.description: You look at the demon and it immediately looks back at you hungrily wanting to taste your blood.
NPC.longDescription: A small demon intensely looks around with burning eyes.

NPC.name: man prisoner
NPC.description: A dying man is here on the ground begging for the pain to stop. His pain somewhat clouds his vision as he screams out loud at the walls.
NPC.longDescription: A man covered in dried blood is lying here at the brink of death.

NPC.name: woman tortured prisoner
NPC.description: A woman lies here after being brutally beaten and tortured. She is here caked in blood and covered with scars from drawn out torture.
NPC.longDescription: A woman is here lying on the ground gasping to her last breath of life.

NPC.name: slave child boy
NPC.description: A little boy clad in shackles is here before you. Tears fill his eyes as he cries for his mommy and daddy.
NPC.longDescription: A little boy in shackles awaits the orders of his masters.

NPC.name: zombie man prisoner
NPC.description: Looking at this man, you see that he is no longer a normal living breathing person. After being tortured to death some sort of magic keeps him alive to endure the pain for even longer.
NPC.longDescription: A man in tattered clothing walks aimlessly down the hallway.

NPC.name: goblin messenger
NPC.description: A small goblin is here hurrying along as if he has an urgent message to deliver.
NPC.longDescription: A small goblin with a piece of paper in hand runs along the corridor.

NPC.name: man Madhatter mad
NPC.description: A man stands here covered in a colorful clothes and a large psychadelic hat. An evil grin covers his face as he looks at you and then looks at his tools.
NPC.longDescription: An insane man stands here with a large hat and a huge studded cane.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared ProtectionGood Flying DetectIllusion

NPC.name: man mad scientist
NPC.description: A lunatic man stands here wearing a large overcoat talking to his pet head and sharpening a new toy he is preparting for the master.
NPC.longDescription: A man wearing crooked glasses and an overcoat stands here whooping madly.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared ProtectionGood DetectIllusion

NPC.name: lady ariel woman
NPC.description: An elven woman stands here before you looking surprisingly calm considering her situation. She is currently shackled and looking in your direction, somewhat relieved.
NPC.longDescription: A young woman of royalty stands here shackled to the wall.
NPC.flags: NPC StayArea Wimpy Cleric AreaAttack AssistAlign

NPC.name: lord henson man
NPC.description: A man is here held against his will. His once royal clothing now is torn and tattered looking no more extraordinary than rags. Nevertheless he holds a smile even though he know what awaits him for today.
NPC.longDescription: A noble man stands here shackled against his will.

NPC.name: bounty hunter man
NPC.description: A large ogre stands before you covered in pelts of wild animals. He looks around and sniffs the air gathering your scent in case you escape.
NPC.longDescription: A large ogre stands before you covered in pelts of wild animals.
NPC.flags: NPC Aggressive StayArea Warrior AreaAttack AssistRace

NPC.name: wolf twoheaded pet
NPC.description: Looking at this wolf strikes fear in your heart. You've never seen such a ferocious pet.
NPC.longDescription: A large two headed wolf stands here with saliva dripping from his mouth.
NPC.flags: NPC Aggressive StayArea Warrior AreaAttack AssistRace

NPC.name: herbalist man
NPC.description: A small and older man sits here around a table brewing his herbal remedies and other special elixirs.
NPC.longDescription: A man is here concoting potions for his employer.

NPC.name: healer
NPC.description: Looking at the healer, you are overwhelmed with comfort and safety. He motions to you to have a seat and he will tend to your wounds.
NPC.longDescription: A healer stands here in the sanctuary awaiting your request.

NPC.name: rieden man
NPC.description: A man sits here in a deep trance, oblivious to the world. He looks extremely tranquil.
NPC.longDescription: A man sits here in a deep trance, oblivious to the world.

Item.Name: bone old
Item.LongDescription: An old bone lies here on the ground.

ExtraDescription.Description: The bone looks like left overs from an unlucky victim.

Item.Name: torn fleshy arm
Item.LongDescription: An fleshy arm has been left on the ground.

Item.Name: skull old
Item.LongDescription: An old skull lies here on the ground.

Item.Name: corpse
Item.LongDescription: The corpse of an unlucky person lies here covered with flies.

Item.Name: scales demonic
Item.LongDescription: A set of demonic scales lies here on the ground.

Item.Name: cloth rags
Item.LongDescription: Some torn clothing is lying here on the ground.

Item.Name: sandals old
Item.LongDescription: A pair of old sandals are lying here on the ground.

Item.Name: potion swirling red
Item.LongDescription: A flask of swirling liquid lies here on the ground.

Item.Name: potion swirling green
Item.LongDescription: A flask of swirling green liquid lies here on the ground.

Item.Name: red herbs
Item.LongDescription: A clump of red herbs are here lying in a bundle.

Item.Name: note paper
Item.LongDescription: A small piece of paper covered with writing waits to be read.

ExtraDescription.Description: You look at the note and it reads....."Mi'lord it seems that the man Rieden has found the sanctuary to the pit. I think it is too late for us to do away with him......

Item.Name: hat psychadelic
Item.LongDescription: A large and colorful hat lies here on the floormaking you feel euphoric.

Item.Name: stockings striped red
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of red striped stockings
Item.LongDescription: A pair of red striped stockings lies here crumpled on the ground.

Item.Name: red orange brimmed hat
Item.ShortDescription: A red and orange brimmed hat
Item.LongDescription: A brimmed hat with red and orange stripes has been left on the ground.

Item.Name: blue green visor hat
Item.LongDescription: A blue and green visor has been left here on the ground.

Item.Name: fuzzy red sash
Item.LongDescription: A fuzzy red sash has been dropped here on the ground.

Item.Name: cane staff wooden
Item.LongDescription: A large wooden cane with an orb on top lies here against a rock.

Item.Name: bone talisman
Item.LongDescription: An ornate talisman lies here waiting for someone to pick it up.

Item.Name: ring hope
Item.LongDescription: A large golden ring with the words, "Hope" engraved on it hovers in the air before you.

Item.Name: glory ring
Item.LongDescription: A large golden ring with the words, "Glory" engraved on it hovers in the air before you.

Item.Name: pelt wolf
Item.LongDescription: A large piece of fur has been left here before you.

Item.Name: collar hunter
Item.LongDescription: A spiked collar has been left here carelessly.
